* ''[[Promise of the Witch-King]]''<ref group="note">''Promise of the Witch-King'' is set in "late summer" (paperback pp. 69,70) "several months" after Jarlaxle and Entreri's arrival in Damara (paperback pp. 44), which occurred in 1367 DR as stated explicitly in the short story "[[Realms_of_Shadow#That_Curious_Sword|That Curious Sword]]". The book further follows directly from events of the short story "[[Realms_of_the_Dragons#Wickless_in_the_Nether|Wickless in the Nether]]", which is explicitly set in 1368 DR.
* ''[[Road of the Patriarch]]''<ref group="note">''Road of the Patriarch'' takes place just before the start of winter (paperback pp. 124, 206) following the summer in which the events of ''Promise of the Witch-King'' took place.
